title: Person of Interest S04E11  Chess is just a game, people aren't
author: Αγγελική Α.
comment: This is one of my all time favorite television moments.
Very true as a statement. Hower in life people and governements, churches etc see us all as a game of chess.
probably the best 45 minutes I have ever spent on my laptop :)
Johnathan Nolan is the best writer in Hollywood
description: Mr.  Finch plays chess with his machine and is teaching her (it) a lesson.
